isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Turbocharger - Installation

item.para: Use anti-seize compound on the mounting bolts and all other bolt threads used on the exhaust system to prevent high temperature corrosion.
The same installation procedure is used for either engines equipped with or without the exhaust bellows feature, except where indicated.

step1.para: Pre-assemble the right and left side tube assemblies to the exhaust inlet adapter with the exhaust flange gasket (either side up) mounted between the exhaust tube flange and the exhaust inlet adapter. Torque the exhaust inlet adapter flange bolts that secure the exhaust tubes to the exhaust inlet adapter to the special torque value.

figure.caption: Installing Right Exhaust Tube Mounting Hardware at Exhaust Manifolds
Installing Left Exhaust Tube Mounting Hardware at Exhaust Manifolds

step1.para: Locate the reassembled exhaust inlet adapter and tube assembly into position and secure the exhaust tube assembly to the left and right exhaust manifolds. Finger tighten the mounting hardware.
Remove all protective caps or duct tape from the turbocharger, pedestal and crankcase openings.

figure.caption: Turbocharger Oil Supply O-Ring and Oil Drain O-Ring

step1.para: Apply a light coat of grease to a new oil supply O-ring and oil drain O-ring. Install the O-rings on the turbocharger mounting pad.

item.para: Place the turbocharger and pedestal assembly onto the mounting pad.
Align the pedestal mounting holes with the holes in the mounting pad.
Install the pedestal mounting bolts and tighten to the special torque value.

Place the pedestal on the mounting pad. Make sure the bolt holes in the pedestal are aligned with the bolt holes in the mounting pad. Install and tighten the four flange head mounting bolts to the special torque value.
Apply a light coat of grease to a new oil supply O-ring and oil drain O-ring. Install the O-rings onto the pedestal.

figure.caption: Installing Turbocharger To Pedestal (1998 and UP Model Years Shown)

item.para: Place the turbocharger on the pedestal. Make sure the bolt holes in the turbocharger are aligned with the bolt holes in the pedestal.
Install and tighten the two turbocharger mounting bolts to the special torque value.

figure.caption: Connecting EBP Piston Rod (1998 and Up Model Years Shown)

step1.para: Connect the latch end of the EBP piston rod to the control arm. Move the slide lock forward to secure the latch end to the control arm.

figure.caption: Installing Turbocharger To Exhaust Inlet Adapter, Late 1997 Model Year Engine Without Bellows Feature Shown)

calloutgroup.callout1: Retaining Bolts (4 for engines with exhaust bellows tubes) (2 for engines without exhaust bellows tubes)
Studs On Inlet Adapter (Used on non exhaust bellows application

step1.para: Late 1997 Model Year, Engines Without Exhaust Bellows Tubes:

item.para: Slide the turbocharger over the two mounting studs of the exhaust inlet adapter.
Secure with two nuts and two retaining bolts. Tighten to the special torque value.
Tighten the exhaust tube mounting hardware at the exhaust manifolds to the special torque value.

step1.para: Late 1997 Model Year, Engines With Exhaust Bellows Tubes:

item.para: Slide the turbocharger over the exhaust inlet adapter and secure with four retaining bolts. Finger tighten the bolts.
Tighten the bolts to the special torque value.
Tighten the exhaust tube mounting hardware at the exhaust manifolds to the special torque value.

figure.caption: Installing the Exhaust Inlet Adapter to the Turbocharger (1998 and Up Model Years Shown)

item.para: Install the exhaust inlet adapter on the turbocharger exhaust inlet. Make sure the dowel on the adapter aligns with the hole in the lip of the exhaust inlet.
Install and tighten the V-band clamp to the special torque value.
Tighten the exhaust tube mounting hardware at the exhaust manifolds to the special torque value.

figure.caption: Installing the EBP Wiring Harness Connector (1998 and Up Model Years Shown)

step1.para: Connect the wiring harness electrical connector to the EBP solenoid.

figure.caption: Installing the Charge Air Cooling Tube/Crossover Pipe Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: Charge Air Cooling Tube/Crossover Pipe Assembly

step1.para: Remove protective caps from the air intake manifolds.
Lubricate a new compressor outlet seal with clean oil. Install the seal in the turbocharger compressor outlet.
Install the charge air cooling tube/crossover pipe assembly as follows:

step2.para: Install the charge air cooling tube/crossover pipe assembly to the turbocharger compressor housing and air intake hoses.
To secure the charge air cooling tube to the turbocharger compressor housing, tighten the turbocharger compressor outlet clamp.
Tighten the four hose clamps (two per side) to secure the hoses to the air intake manifold covers.

step1.para: Install the air inlet elbow. Tighten the clamp.
Install and secure the exhaust pipe connecting the turbocharger to the muffler.

figure.caption: Install Road Draft Tube Mounting Bolts (Engine With Exhaust Bellows Feature Shown)

step1.para: Move the road draft tube into the correct position.
Install road draft tube mounting bolts and secure to crankcase. Tighten bolts to standard torque value.
